description.ko: 완벽한 기하학적 기념비가 균형 잡힌 혼돈의 상태로 산산조각 나는 디지털 엔트로피를 시각적으로 표현한 작품입니다.
description.en: A visual representation of digital entropy where a perfect geometric monument shatters into a balanced state of chaos.

prompt: A massive, brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian tower fracturing in mid-air within a clinical #FFFFFF void. Sharp #808080 geometric shards and #C0C0C0 scanline glitches erupt from the cracks, creating a recursive digital collapse. Raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass surfaces with deep digital noise textures. 8k resolution, high-contrast monochrome complexity, chaos within order.
